title: Athan Pro Muslim: Prayer Times Quran & Qibla
summary: Known as the best mobile app for Athan prayer time, Quran, Hadith, Qibla Ramadan
description: Known as the best mobile app for Athan and prayer times, our app is used by millions of Muslims around the world. Athan brings you the most accurate prayer times and many other features such as Quran, Tasbeeh, Islamic Calendar, Compass to locate the Qiblah, Ramadan 2018 etc.Features: ********- Best Ramadan 2018 Dashboard including Hadith and beautiful Islamic backgrounds- Accurate prayer time calculated depending on your geographic position - Many athans sounds to choose from and apply to the call of the prayer- An integrated compass pointing to the direction of the Qibla.- Hadith of the Day- Picture of the Day- Access to our free apps Hisn Al Muslim and Quran Pro.- Calendar with of religious holidays dates- Two watch faces for Android Wear.- Daily Haramain to listen to the latest prayers from Mekka and Medina- Islamic Cards- Monthly schedule for prayer time- Tasbeeh with phonetic support, French, and English - Azkar before, during and after the prayer - Display of 99 names of Allah in text and audio- Ability to customize wallpapersNote: Please enable the location service to get the prayer times otherwise the app can't locate your city.In case of any problem, please contact us at contact [AT] quanticapps.com
descriptionHTML:
Known as the best mobile app for Athan and prayer times, our app is used by millions of Muslims around the world. Athan brings you the most accurate prayer times and many other features such as Quran, Tasbeeh, Islamic Calendar, Compass to locate the Qiblah, Ramadan 2018 etc.

Features:
********

- Best Ramadan 2018 Dashboard including Hadith and beautiful Islamic backgrounds
- Accurate prayer time calculated depending on your geographic position
- Many athans sounds to choose from and apply to the call of the prayer
- An integrated compass pointing to the direction of the Qibla.
- Hadith of the Day
- Picture of the Day
- Access to our free apps Hisn Al Muslim and Quran Pro.
- Calendar with of religious holidays dates
- Two watch faces for Android Wear.
- Daily Haramain to listen to the latest prayers from Mekka and Medina
- Islamic Cards
- Monthly schedule for prayer time
- Tasbeeh with phonetic support, French, and English
- Azkar before, during and after the prayer
- Display of 99 names of Allah in text and audio
- Ability to customize wallpapers

Note: Please enable the location service to get the prayer times otherwise the app can't locate your city.

In case of any problem, please contact us at contact [AT] quanticapps.com
comments: Hanafi Asr choice doesn't work. I've sent numerous emails via the app and directly through the website detailing the fault with photos showing the mistake and have never got a reply back from the developer. I asked if they knew that Asr prayer has 2 options in the app but instead of showing the Asr time slightly differently ,according to whether you select the HANAFI option or the MALIKI/HANBALI/SHAFI option, it shows the same time. If you have this option in a prayer app then you must understand what it means and then make sure that it works otherwise it puts into question your credibility. I don't know why the developer will not reply to me or engage with me. All I want is the app to work.

My favorite prayer time app for Android. The widget is a huge time saver to see the next prayer and countdown and as well as the qibla tracker is very accurate. So happy that the widget also updates time in its own now without having to open the app itself!
It is a good app, but disappointed because could not restore my previous purchase to remove ads and have widgets
Qibla not working it keeps loading and loadings
البرنامج مبيأذنش خالص حد يعرف ليه شكله كده مش للاندرويد
why i  did  not hear such  sound or call adhan during prayer  time?
recentChanges: Added more accuracy in the prayer times
